page.title: 16LEISURE: BLEASBY/THURGARTON
page.content: Whilst many regret there are not more leisure facilities or opportunities, what there are seems commensurate with a joint population of about 1100 people. In{Bleasby}there is a village hall, the{Jubilee Pond}area for walking and nature,and use of the playing field at the school.There is a Chapel and a Church with Sunday Schools and Youth Clubs.There is the W.I.,an artists' group,Brownies and Guides,aerobics and judo classes and a mother and toddler group. In{Thurgarton},there is the Church and Chapel with a joint Sunday School and a ladies' group,an excellent hall, the W.I.,a table tennis club and a sewing class.There is a thriving{ {cricket team}which plays in the fine setting of the{Priory}grounds and is conceived by all as being "their" club
